Sourcing Table.Sourced Statement: The Tennessee Association of Realtors is the sixth largest spender on Tennessee politics, according to the Tennessee Lookout’s database, having spent $6.5 million on lobbying, campaign donations and other political expenditures since 2009.
The Tennessee Association of Realtors has been Swann’s top funder since the start of 2009, according to the Tennessee Lookout, giving him $18,750.
It has also given Boyd $11,500 since 2009, making it his No. 6 funder.

During the subcommittee hearing, Shelby County Commissioner Erika Sugarmon and City of Memphis Division of Public Works director Robert Knecht endorsed it and two landlord representatives spoke against it.
Sourcing Table.Source Justification: who spoke against the bill during the subcommittee hearing
